deliverables.name: Provisioning Package (Layer 4.5)
deliverables.description: Complete export/import/handover/context tooling for process memory

deliverables.name: CLI Commands
commands: cogito memory export [format] - Export to markdown/json/yaml
cogito memory import [file] - Import with validation
cogito memory handover - Generate session handover document
cogito memory context [topic] - Generate focused context snippets
deliverables.description: 4 new CLI command groups with 257 LOC added

deliverables.name: Handover Template
deliverables.description: Jinja2 template for comprehensive handover documents with statistics, recent activity, key concepts

deliverables.name: Integration Tests
deliverables.description: End-to-end tests for export/import roundtrips and CLI workflows

mypy.result: Success: no issues found in 5 source files

capabilities_unlocked: Export process memory to markdown/json/yaml for session handover
Import validated process memory entries from external files
Generate comprehensive handover documents with statistics and context
Generate focused context snippets for specific topics
CLI automation for all provisioning workflows
Filter exports by category and tags

five_cornerstones.configurability: Export formats, filter options, validation modes
five_cornerstones.extensibility: Easy to add new export formats or generation strategies
five_cornerstones.integration: CLI commands, template system, ProcessMemoryStore integration
five_cornerstones.automation: Automated validation, format detection, error reporting

next_steps_recommendation: System ready for production use. Can now provision 50+ process memory entries for seamless AI session continuity.
